jobDescription:
We are currently looking for friendly, compassionate and reliable individuals to join our Team! Previous MMJ experience is a plus but not required. Willing to train the right candidate.


Qualities we are looking for:


- Having reliable transportation is a MUST 

- Flexible schedule (Evenings/Weekends/Holidays)

- Able to listen thoroughly and follow directions

- Outgoing / High-Energy / Able to represent different product lines for demo/ promo days.

- Good, basic comprehension of math (addition, subtraction, weights)

- Friendly, Personable, compassionate

- Organized and clean

- Attention to detail is KEY

- Good communication and problem solving skills

- Works well with others

- Honest, Dependable & Punctual a must !

-Must be able to pass a background criminal check


TO BE CONSIDERED FOR INTERVIEW YOUR E-MAIL MUST INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING:

1. Tell us about yourself and your current availability

2. Attach Resume & Your contact information: email and phone number preferred

3. Must Submit 2 current pictures of yourself & IG/FB link 


We look forward to reviewing all applicants and are hiring immediately. 


*MUST have valid California I.D and medical recommendation. Part time positions available with semi flexible work hours. 

Pay weekly (+Tips- take home daily)
